abstract: British authorities gave Goldman Sachs a nice present, writing off $16 million that the investment bank owed in back taxes. British tax officials said the deal with Goldman was a mistake, the Guardian reported.
snippet: British authorities gave Goldman Sachs a nice present, writing off $16 million that the investment bank owed in back taxes. British tax officials said the deal with Goldman was a mistake, the Guardian reported.
